content:
The Lu family motto is "early to bed, early to rise makes you healthy!"
I follow it perfectly!
<size=30>Well... at least the "early to rise" part.</size>
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
Wake up with a "koi fish flip" —
It'll shake the sleepy water out of your brain for instant alertness!
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
The most important thing about getting up early is having a good meal.
With a full belly and some kung fu practice, you'll be strong—
<size=64>HYAH!</size>
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊
